scripts.build: bun run build:api && bun run build:web
scripts.lint: bun run lint:api && bun run lint:web
scripts.lint:fix: bun run lint:fix:api && bun run lint:fix:web
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:api && bun run typecheck:web
scripts.format: bun run format:api && bun run format:web
scripts.format:check: bun run format:check:api && bun run format:check:web
scripts.test: bun run test:api && bun run test:web
scripts.clean: rm -rf api/dist web/.next node_modules api/node_modules web/node_modules
